message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to be selling this product which I believe you'll find valuable. I'm asking for $18,000 to start.  I'm open to discussing the price, so feel free to share your thoughts.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your effort. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand your budget considerations, but $10,000 is significantly below what I can accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $12,500 for the product.
